lead_paragraph: While attention is focused on when the 2022 tournament in Qatar should be held, there are potentially bigger issues lingering over the 2018 World Cup in Russia.

headline.main: 2022 World Cup Isn’t Only One Facing Issues
headline.print_headline: 2022 World Cup Isn't Only One Facing Issues

snippet: While attention is focused on when the 2022 tournament in Qatar should be held, there are potentially bigger issues lingering over the 2018 World Cup in Russia.
